Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6220 HIGHWAY 7,SUITE 600, WOODBRIDGE, VAUGHAN, Ontario, L4H 4G3, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Waste Connections is the third- largest integrated provider of traditional solid waste and recycling services in the North America, operating 91 active landfills (12 are E&P waste landfills), 132 transfer stations, and 68 recycling operations. The firm serves residential, commercial, industrial, and energy end markets. Waste Connections entered the Canadian market with its 2016 merger with Progressive Waste. In 2020, 13% of consolidated revenue was generated from the firm's Canadian segment.
